ellis.image.processing
Class AbstractFastOp

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ellis.image.processing.AbstractDataOp
        |
        +--ellis.image.processing.AbstractFastOp
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackgroundSubtractFastOp, RescaleFastOp
public abstract class AbstractFastOp
extends AbstractDataOp

The abstract superclass of all fast or non-threaded image processing operations.

After instantiation an operation is begun by calling the filter method.

See Also:
ImageUtilities, AbstractSlowOp

public abstract java.awt.image.BufferedImage filter(java.awt.image.BufferedImage source)
